remarks: Rotate lattice join of 4 classes.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jul-2012.)
statement:
latjass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latjass.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latj4rot $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( Z e. B /\ W e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .\/ Y ) .\/ ( Z .\/ W ) ) = ( ( W .\/ X ) .\/ ( Y .\/ Z ) ) ) $.
